[[Category:Crafting]]
[[File:LegendaryCrafting3.png|thumb|A Dimensional Archway which can be created with Enchanted Marble using the Legendary Crafting System.]]
__TOC__
==Description==
Dimensional Archways are special teleporters that look like a large marble archway. These teleporters can be placed in your home and will allow you to link the where the Dimensional Archway takes you to another tile in your home. These are one-way teleporters however, so keep in mind once you walk through them they you will not be able to come back the way you came!

==Crafting Archways==
Dimensional Archways are part of the [[Legendary_Crafting_-_Starting_Out#Craftable_Items|Legendary Craftable Items]] and requires that your crafter has completed the questline to craft Legendary Crafts. You will also need to find a dimensional archway recipe which you can use on the legendary crafter in order to start being able to craft these. Once you know the recipe, you will need to gather 3 Enchanted Marble and use a soulforge to create the Dimensional Archway deed.

==Dyeing Archways==
===Lootable Dyes===
Archways can be dyed with special deeds that can be found through [[Monster_of_the_Week#Rewards|Monster of the Week Rewards]] or as [[Treasure_Map#Loot_.26_Spawns|Level 7 Treasure Map loot]]. These are single use items and will change the color of your current Dimensional Archway to whatever color the deed currently is.

===Donation Dyes===
Certain Archway Dyes can be purchased through Nadine the Exotic Item Donation Vendor for 3000 donation coins with the item called Material Archway Dye Selector. This deed can be used to open a menu to create one and only one deed of the selector colors shown below:
<gallery mode="packed">
File:Archway_Hue_Selector_Menu.PNG
File:Archway_Hue_Selector_Vendor.PNG
File:Archway_Hue_Selector_Deeds.PNG
</gallery>

====Notes:====
* Donation Data is from the Donation Update Fall 2019 Forum Announcement(and some colors may or may not be available anymore): https://www.uoforum.com/threads/donation-update-28-fall-2019.108312/
